snippet: The automaker also told dealers to tell potential buyers about defective airbags.
abstract: Toyota Motor Corp says it has instructed its dealers to disclose which of its new cars still use airbags that may deteriorate over time and be susceptible to deploying violently; models will need to be recalled by 2018 under National Highway Traffic Safety Admin plan.
lead_paragraph: The automaker also told dealers to tell potential buyers about defective airbags.

headline.main: Toyota Names Vehicles That Still Have Faulty Airbags
headline.print_headline: Toyota Dealers to Disclose Faulty Airbags in New Cars
